articles.title: PBCN Petro Canada: Celebrating 20 years of success and growth
articles.author: Sponsored Content
articles.summary: PBCN Petro Canada was founded 20 years ago as a small gas station in Prince Albert. The company has since added two more service stations and a Tim Horton's in Flin Flon and Creighton. On May 13, 2025, the company will celebrate the 20th anniversary of the first service station at 3451 2nd Ave. West with a special live-on-location anniversary celebration.

articles.title: ‘AI+ consumption' to unlock new potential, drive high-quality growth
articles.author: Liu Gang
articles.summary: China has recently issued a plan outlining special initiatives to boost domestic consumption. It proposes 30 specific measures across eight key areas, including advancing "AI+ consumption" to accelerate the development and adoption of technologies such as autonomous driving, smart wearables, ultra-high-definition video, brain-computer interface, robotics and additive manufacturing.

articles.title: 6 News at 5:30 p.m. for 3/21/2025
articles.summary: The main purpose of drugstore shampoo for oily hair is to remove and control oil, but formulas are available to match other needs as well as to match the needs of the user.      Â   i.e. to remove, control oil.

articles.title: Google Pixel Tablet Now 30% Off
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Google entered the smartphone market much later than its competitors Samsung, Apple, OnePlus, and almost any other manufacturer you can think of. Google is still ahead of its competitors in terms of development of smartphones, however. Google's Android phones are much better than Samsung's and Apple's.

articles.title: The challenges of package opening and instruction reading in my 70s
articles.summary: K bought a new phone charger and a new case and screen protector for her phone. She couldn't remove the packaging from the charger because it was too securely attached. She needed kitchen scissors, bread knife and a scalpel to do it. Mouthwash and cleaning products come in tightly sealed bottles.

articles.title: New York Mobile Redefines Wireless with Personalized Phone Numbers and Streamlined Digital Experience
articles.summary: New York Mobile launched its premium mobile virtual network operator (MVNO) service this week. NYMobile gives users access to the nation's fastest and largest 5G network, but it's the brand's focus on personalization that sets it apart. The company's launch signals a shift in how mobile services are positioned.

articles.title: Weird Gear Shifters Are Ticking Off Customers
articles.summary: Automakers are trying to reinvent the wheel with their gear shifters. Some customers are not happy with the changes and find them confusing. Jeff Tropeano, a 43-year-old Colorado resident, finds the touch screen shifter on his Model S Plaid difficult to use.

articles.title: New York Mobile Redefines Wireless with Personalized Phone Numbers and Streamlined Digital Experience
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: NYMobile offers nationwide access to custom phone numbers starting at $99 a pop. It's backed by T-Mobile's 5G network.      Â   i.e. NYMobile is a subsidiary of T-Mo's network.

articles.title: I caved to an Instagram ad for Jones Road and ended up discovering my favorite natural-look makeup brand
articles.author: Sally Kaplan
articles.summary: The Miracle Balm from Jones Road is one of the bestsellers of the brand. The foundation is hydrating and easy to apply. It doesn't cover the redness caused by rosacea, but it helps to even things out. The gel bronzer can be used for contouring or bronzing.

articles.title: Google adds AI voiceovers to Google Vids
articles.author: Arthur Brown
articles.summary: Google Vids is a video creation platform that allows you to create and edit videos. Google is adding AI voiceovers to Google Vids. It will be available for Google Workspace customers with Business Standard and Plus, Enterprise Standard, Essentials, Enterprise Essentials and Education Premium plans.

articles.title: Syntheia Announces 10,000 Subscriptions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. announced 10,000 subscribers for its AssistantNLP platform ahead of Management's expectations by nine months. Management has revised its original internal subscriber forecast and now aims to achieve approximately 100,000 by the end of 2025. Syntheia is a leading provider of conversational AI solutions for inbound telephone call management.

articles.title: Syntheia Announces 10,000 Subscriptions
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Syntheia Corp. has 10,000 subscribers for its AssistantNLP platform ahead of schedule and forecast by nine months. Management has revised its original internal subscriber forecast for 2025 and now aims to achieve approximately 100,000 by the end of 2025.

articles.title: Poco Snapdragon 8 Elite phone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: The Poco F7 series is due to be launched in a few days. Early benchmarks for the top-tier model have been released for the Poco Poco.    Read more at: http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/20/technology/poco-f7-series-review-benchmarks-for-the-top-tier-model-premier-poco.

articles.title: Poco F7 Ultra gaming
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: The Poco F7 series is due to be launched in a few days. Early benchmarks for the top-tier model have been released for the Poco Poco.    Read more at: http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/20/technology/poco-f7-series-review-benchmarks-for-the-top-tier-model-premier-poco.

articles.title: Poco March 27 launch
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: The Poco F7 series is due to be launched in a few days. Early benchmarks for the top-tier model have been released for the Poco Poco.    Read more at: http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/20/technology/poco-f7-series-review-benchmarks-for-the-top-tier-model-premier-poco.

articles.title: Poco F7 launch India
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: The Poco F7 series is due to be launched in a few days. Early benchmarks for the top-tier model have been released for the Poco Poco.    Read more at: http://www.cnn.com/2013/01/20/technology/poco-f7-series-review-benchmarks-for-the-top-tier-model-premier-poco.

articles.title: T&C Tried & True: The Blush & Highlight Duo That Really Does Last All Day
articles.author: Roxanne Adamiyatt
articles.summary: Roxanne Adamiyatt is Deputy Digital Lifestyle Director at Town & Country. She recommends Isamaya's Skin Enhancing Duo, which is a blush and highlighter duo in a mirror compact. Roxanne is a life-long lover of fashion and beauty.

articles.title: Salt Lake City one of four cities to test new Chick-fil-A sweets
articles.author: JACOB FREEMAN
articles.summary: Salt Lake City joins San Diego, Chicago and Tampa as test markets for Chick-fil-A's new products: The Icedream Spin and the Icingream Float. The new treats are only available at select stores in the test markets. KSL TV's anchors tried Sprite Spin and Diet Coke Float and found Sprite Spin to be better.

articles.title: Everything I Use to Not Wash My Hair
articles.author: Zoe Papelis
articles.summary: Amika dry shampoo from Amika refreshes her hair texture and adds a volume boost. Kérastase night serum is her holy grail for keeping her long hair hydrated. Joe's Vitamin E Oil has always done the job for her. The Brigeo Scalp Scrub leaves my scalp feeling clean and leaves my hair feeling very clean.

articles.title: The best budget vacuums for 2025, tested and reviewed: Bissell, Wyze, Kenmore and more
articles.summary: Bissell, Wyze and Kenmore are the best vacuums for around $100. Pet-friendly vacs, car vacs and Dyson vacs are also included in the list of the best vacuum cleaners of 2025. The list includes stick, upright, canister and upright vacuum cleaners.

articles.title: Car wash boom continues as Sud Stop plans new Orlando location
articles.author: Trevor Fraser
articles.summary: Plans for a new car wash in Orlando are highlighting the persistent growth of the industry. Atlanta-based engineering firm Foresite Group submitted plans to Orange County for a Sud Stop Car Wash at 9065 Curry Ford Road in the Walmart Neighborhood Market plaza. The request was made on behalf of landowner Orlando Curry Ford Retail Investment LLC.

articles.title: Cat Tested, Mom Approved.
articles.author: A Pagan in Arizona
articles.summary: Lacey has a new tee shirt and a ballcap of the same design. It's a nice shirt and Lacey thinks it's a real nice shirt. You can find the tee shirt here and the ballcap here. Lacey didn't manage to get a picture of the shirt.

articles.title: This cordless Shark stick vacuum — a rare 50% off — has a little secret up its sleeve
articles.summary: Shark Cordless Pro Vacuum is on sale for $200 on Amazon. It has an Odor Neutralizer Technology to prevent odors from entering the home. It's lightweight, easy to use and easy to store. It can run for up to 40 minutes per charge. It comes with crevice and pet tool attachments.

articles.title: Max has been adding some of Prime Video's most annoying features but also a load of better upgrades
articles.author: Amelia Schwanke
articles.summary: Max has been rolled out to 73 new countries in the space of nine months and will launch on Aussie shores on March 31. Since September 2024, 120 new features have been added to the app, including ads that let you shop for products related to the content you're watching, sponsored content recommendations and commercials that target'moments'.

articles.title: 2025 Did Not Come to Play With the Year's Most Noteworthy Scents
articles.author: Brooke Knappenberger
articles.summary: The best new perfumes of 2025 offer a little something for every type of perfume consumer. New fragrances from Phlur, Kayali, D.S. & Durga, and more are flipping the classic category on its head. Victoria's Secret's Exclusivist and MC's Associate Commerce Editor recommend them to their readers.

articles.title: Is The Grownsy EaseClean Bottle Washer Pro Worth It?
articles.summary: The GROWNSY EaseClean Bottle Washer Pro combines washing and sterilizing functions in one appliance. The Quick Wash mode completes a cleaning cycle in just 19 minutes. The compact design makes it an ideal fit for homes with limited kitchen space. It's designed to accommodate up to four bottles, pump parts, sippy cups, and other small accessories without taking up too much room.

articles.title: The 28 best gifts for your brother that he'll reach for daily
articles.summary: Growing up with brothers is a unique experience. Here are some of our favorite gifts for brothers. They are personalized and practical gifts for every type of brother down below. They include shoes from Rothy's, leather briefcases from Coach Outlet and gift cards and gift boxes.

articles.title: Vision Direct Ushers in a Bold New Era with a Striking Rebrand and Dynamic Website Launch
articles.author: Vision Direct
articles.summary: GoVisionDirect.com has a completely reimagined website with a new brand identity based on the company mantra: "Challenge Accepted".    "Our new identity says fearlessness. It embodies our determination to do whatever it takes to get the job done."

articles.title: Amazon Spring Sale cleaning essentials: The best deals from Dyson, Shark, iRobot, up to 50% off
articles.summary: Amazon's Big Spring Sale starts on Tuesday, March 25th. Dyson V8 Plus Cordless Vacuum for $330 (was $470) is on sale for 30%. Black & Decker Dustbuster AdvancedClean Handheld Vacuum is $47. iRobot Roomba Robot Vacuum and Mop for $160 is an all-time low. The Yahoo editor-approved extendable electric scrubber is down to $30.

articles.title: S Mega Mart inagurated in Anantnag
articles.author: Gk News Service
articles.summary: S Mega Mart was inaugurated in south Kashmir's Anantnag district on Friday. It offers a wide range of branded apparel, groceries, and household essentials under one roof. The company plans to expand S Mega Mart by opening more outlets across Jammu and Kashmir.

articles.title: Google Messages Remote Delete Feature Now Available: Here's How It Works and How to Use It
articles.author: Isaiah Richard
articles.summary: Google Messages' Remote Delete feature is now available for all. Android Authority found the feature in the app's code in its latest version. It allows users to delete messages sent from one device while using another. The other device needs to be connected to the Google Messages app and logged in to the same Google account to work.

articles.title: Congratulations. We did it, everyone. We're only in March, but we broke the 2024 record
articles.summary: Do you have adblock enabled? If so, please share this information.    iReport.com: Do you use adblock? If not, please send us a link.  I'm looking for information on how to block adblock. I'm on Google Adblock.

articles.title: Anthropic appears to be using Brave to power web search for its Claude chatbot
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Anthropic rolled out a web search feature for its AI-powered chatbot platform, Claude, bringing the bot in line with many of its rivals. It was not immediately clear which search index might be powering the feature, but evidence suggests its Brave Search, the.

articles.title: Celebrating youth innovation: The Top 16 Youth-Owned Brands Awards return to Sandton
articles.author: Anita Nkonki
articles.summary: The Top 16 Youth-Owned Brands Awards (YOBAs) will be held on June 21 in Sandton to recognise the transformative efforts of young South African entrepreneurs. Pat Mahlangu is the founder of YOBAs and Lerato Agency. He believes that young people are significant contributors to South Africa's economy.

articles.title: 25 Very Small But Immensely Useful Target Products You Should Definitely Be Carrying Around With You
articles.author: Griffin Gonzales
articles.summary: Some of the products were sent as samples by BuzzFeed and were independently selected by our editors. They are affordable and pack a big punch. They include a PopSocket phone pocket, mini portable humidifier, Stasher reusable silicone travel bags and a Neutena SPF 50 sunscreen stick.

articles.title: What is Rawbot? Everything we know about the AI comparison tool
articles.author: Max Slater-Robins
articles.summary: Rawbot is an AI model comparison platform for researchers, developers, and businesses. It provides a user-friendly interface to assess performance, strengths, and weaknesses of different AI models side by side. It is free to use, but has some limitations, such as input length restrictions and a limited selection of AI models.

articles.title: Inzoi's 'Smart Zoi' AI system sounds great on paper but seeing it in a live demo didn't exactly wow me
articles.summary: Developers of early access life sim Inzoi are developing an AI system called "Smart Zoi" for their characters. Kangwook Lee, head of deep learning at Krafton, gave a live demo of Smart Zoi at the Game Developers Conference in San Francisco this week. It's an ambitious idea, but it didn't impress him.

articles.title: OpenAI Gives Its Agents a Voice
articles.author: Megan Crouse
articles.summary: OpenAI is expanding its stable of AI voices to include agentic models. The new models include Gpt-4o-transcribe and gpt-3o-mini-transcript. Developers can access them on the OpenAI API and integrate them with the Agents SDK. The models have been tuned for accuracy and reliability.

articles.title: Nokia 110 4G review: a cheap burner phone with a battery that lasts for weeks
articles.author: Tom May
articles.summary: The Nokia 110 4G is a feature phone that retails for about $40 USD / £30 GB / AU$60. It's a modern take on the classic feature phone at a very affordable price. It has a 1.8-inch screen, but it's better than the 2.8 inch screens of the Nokia 225 4G and Nokia 3310. The camera is very limited and doesn't offer the quality you'd expect from a cheap feature phone.

articles.title: Introducing the New Auto Insurance Platform Brought to You by Skydd
articles.author: Skydd The post
articles.summary: Skydd has introduced the new auto insurance platform to BellaNaija and is showcasing Africa to the world. The platform is brought to you by Skydd.    for more information visit: www.skydd.com and www.bellanaija.com.

articles.title: New products get families ready for almost anything
articles.author: Benjamin Hoadley
articles.summary: New products get families ready for almost anything. Perci Vest makes disaster readiness mobile and hands-free. Loulou Lollipop's Ocean Wonders collection includes soft, sustainable products in perfect-for-summer designs like Smiley Sharks and Silly Seals. TheralCE's newest product line includes an ankle ice pack wrap and knee ice wrap.

articles.title: The Weekly Covet: T&C's Ultimate Spring Cleaning Checklist
articles.author: The Editors
articles.summary: "The Weekly Covet" is an editor-approved wish list for beauty, travel, fashion and everything in between. This week, Lauren Hubbard recommends in-wash beads for laundry, which she likes very much, because they keep laundry smelling good for a long time.

articles.title: India Biggest Battery Phone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: After the successful debut of the iQOO Neo 10R, the smartphone brand is gearing up to launch its next big product. iQoo is planning to launch the next generation of its flagship smartphone.    iqoo.com will let you know when it launches.

articles.title: Looking to Remodel Your Home? Use This AI Tool for Inspiration
articles.summary: Watch out for AI oddities, like the basket toilet it gave me when it was showing me how to remodel my home, as it did with this AI tool.  .    http://www.cnet.com/news/researching/how-to-remodel-your-home-with-the-help-of-ai-tools/

articles.title: How AI Can Help You Brush Up on Your Flirting Skills
articles.author: Carly Quellman
articles.summary: Replika is a personal AI companion developed in 2017 by Luka, a company co-founded by Eugenia Kuyda. The chatbot was originally inspired by memorializing a late friend and was built to provide its users with a companion to help express themselves or engage in meaningful conversations.

articles.title: Future competitor to Mercadona arrives in Portugal
articles.summary: Primaprix, Normal's rival and a success in Spain, arrives in Portugal with low prices and wants to become a future competitor of Mercadona. The first Primaprix store in Portugal will open in Guimarães. The company has more than 260 stores across Europe and employs more than two thousand workers.

articles.title: I tried Fabulosa's floor cleaner in must-have new scent – the smell lasts for 48 hours
articles.author: Digital Journalist
articles.summary: Fabulosa released a new cleaning range in B&M this spring. The new Hummingbird fragrance has notes of pink dragonfruit, lychee, Brazilian jasmine, ocean air and hibiscus with a base of creamy vanilla and rich sun musk. It's available in a 220ml Concentrated Multi-Purpose Cleaner, a one-litre Floor Cleaner and a 750ml Multi- Purposes Cleaner.

articles.title: I tried Fabulosa's floor cleaner in must-have new scent – the smell lasts for 48 hours
articles.author: Paige Beresford
articles.summary: Fabulosa released a new cleaning range in B&M this spring. The new Hummingbird fragrance has gone down well with shoppers. Paige tried Fabulosa's new floor cleaner on her wooden laminate floor. She liked it very much. Fabulous has 15 cleaning tips.

articles.title: Dirty trainers will be 'sparkling white' when cleaned with 2 products
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: Lucy Kalice's trainers were dirty and smelly after a night out, but she was able to treat them with a few scoops of the Pink Stuff Oxi Powder and bicarbonate of soda to make them look brand new again.

articles.title: Lidl launches 89p Easter treat with '£4k worth' of chocolate toppings
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Lidl's Easter brownies with mini eggs are on sale for 89p each. They contain eggs, milk, soy, and wheat and are not suitable for lactose intolerant or gluten-free people. Lidl has been making waves recently for its Dubai-style chocolate, launched on TikTok.

articles.title: Be careful about buying into these TV gimmicks
articles.author: Roger Fingas
articles.summary: TV makers are still trying gimmicks to make their products stand out. Curved and rollable sets don't serve any useful function. 8K resolution doesn't serve much practical purpose yet. 3D TVs have come and gone sporadically since 1935, but got a major push in 2010 following the success of Avatar.

articles.title: Claude 3.7 Sonnet AI now supports web search, but only for paid users
articles.summary: Anthropic added online search support to Claude 3.7 Sonnet. The feature is limited and requires a paid subscription. Claude Pro starts at $20/month, matching the ChatGPT Plus subscription price. Anthropic says support for the free Claude plan is coming soon.

articles.title: CoreWeave: Has the AI rose lost its bloom?
articles.summary: NBR Marketplace Yearly Premium Online Subscription + NBR Marketplace NZ$499.00 / yearly. Smartphone Only Annual Subscription NZ$299.00 - yearly. Premium Group Membership 10 Users NZ$385 +GST / monthly $38.5 per user - Pay by monthly credit card debit $21 per user.

articles.title: AirJetz – Redefining the Future of High-Speed Hair Dryers: Making High-Speed Hair Dryers Accessible to Every Household with Technological Innovation and Affordability
articles.summary: AirJetz is breaking price barriers in the high-speed hair dryer market through disruptive pricing strategies and technological innovation. Its products include TurboFlow™ Turbine Airflow Technology and IonShield™ Negative Ion Hair Care Technology. Prime members get next-day delivery and a 30-day hassle-free return policy.

articles.title: Menu Options for Lent
articles.summary: To stream KENS 5 on your phone, you need the KENS 5 app. It's free and available for Android and iOS devices. It is available on Google Play and Apple's Play Store. It costs about $0.99 per app.

articles.title: LambdaTest launches Firebase App Distribution Support for Seamless Real Device Testing
articles.summary: A new feature bridges Firebase and LambdaTest, enabling faster, collaborative app testing on real Android and iOS devices. With access to 10,000+ real devices in the cloud, teams can test Firebase-distributed apps both manually and through automation.

articles.title: LambdaTest launches Firebase App Distribution Support for Seamless Real Device Testing
articles.author: Lambdatest
articles.summary: By connecting their Firebase account to LambdaTest, users can seamlessly sync projects and app releases, collaborate with teammates and start real-time testing sessions on Android and iOS devices. This page requires Javascript to be able to read premium content. Please enable it in your browser settings.

articles.title: LambdaTest launches Firebase App Distribution Support for Seamless Real Device Testing
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: A new integration between Firebase and LambdaTest enables faster, collaborative app testing on real Android and iOS devices. With access to 10,000+ real devices in the cloud, teams can test Firebase-distributed apps both manually and through automation, ensuring functionality and performance.

articles.title: LambdaTest launches Firebase App Distribution Support for Seamless Real Device Testing
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LambdaTest has introduced a new integration with Firebase App Distribution. This update enables development and QA teams to directly install and test Firebase-distributed apps on LambdaTest's real device cloud, eliminating the need for manual uploads and accelerating the feedback cycle.

articles.title: LambdaTest launches Firebase App Distribution Support for Seamless Real Device Testing
articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: LambdaTest has introduced a new integration with Firebase App Distribution. This update enables development and QA teams to install and test Firebase-distributed apps on LambdaTest's real device cloud. It reduces context switching and ensures that the exact build distributed via Firebase is the one being tested.

articles.title: Clothes will smell 'so fresh' for weeks with 'game-changing' tip
articles.author: Nicola Roy
articles.summary: Laundry is a tiring and time-consuming task. Cleaning expert Aleyshia May has shared a 'game-changing' hack to keep laundry smelling fresh for weeks on end. All you need to do is to put some laundry scent boosters in small mesh bags and place them in your drawers, wardrobe or anywhere else you store clothes.

articles.title: Amagi & Olyzon Collaborating To Deliver Innovative CTV Ad Campaigns
articles.author: Mark K. Miller
articles.summary: Amagi and Olyzon announce a technical collaboration. It allows them to create new and diversified CTV ad formats without additional integration efforts or vendors. The initiative focuses on 'in-content' ad formats aimed at engaging viewers beyond traditional ad breaks and L-band overlays.

articles.title: Another detail leaks about the colorful Motorola Edge 60 Fusion
articles.author: Bryan M. Wolfe
articles.summary: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion is expected to be announced early next month and launched first in India before being released worldwide. It will have a 6.7-inch quad-curved AMOLED display with a 120Hz refresh rate and a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 chip. It is also expected to have a primary 50-megapixel Sony camera, a secondary 13-megapixels sensor, and a 32- megapixel front-facing camera for selfies.

articles.title: Claude AI catches up with ChatGPT by offering a new search tool
articles.author: Digital Trends
articles.summary: Claude has a new web search tool that allows you to find information by searching on the Internet. Claude is an AI assistant with built-in search capabilities. It's available on Google Play Store and on Apple's App Store. It can be downloaded from the App Store for free.

articles.title: ZJLD Group FY2024 Performance Shows High-Quality and Stable Development with a Remarkable 116.3% Surge in Operating Cash Flow
articles.author: Media Outreach Newswire
articles.summary: ZJLD Group Inc. reports its annual results for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2024. The baijiu industry experienced a sustained decline in consumer demand starting from the second quarter of the year. Zhenjiu, the flagship brand, expanded its presence in emerging sales channels and among premium clientele. The Group reported a gross profit of approximately RMB4,143.0 million (FY2023: RMB 4,079.9 million).

articles.title: Oral-B toothbrush shoppers say is 'worth a splurge' is massive £279 off in Amazon sale
articles.author: Lea Dzifa Seeberg
articles.summary: Amazon has knocked £279 off an Oral-B iO7 Electric Toothbrush. The toothbrush is now £151.78 at Amazon, Boots and Currys. It has 4.4 stars from 364 reviews at Boots, 4.8 stars from 13 reviews at Currys and 4.6 stars from 129 reviews on Amazon.

articles.title: Lee Enterprises expands AI offerings to empower local businesses
articles.author: Lee Enterprises
articles.summary: Amplified Digital, the digital marketing agency for media company Lee Enterprises, is launching a suite of AI-driven solutions to help local businesses thrive. The first product in the suite, AI Enablement, introduces a range of features tailored to modern business needs. The launch aligns with Lee Enterprises' mission to foster economic growth and support local entrepreneurs.

articles.title: I'd say the UK is cheese obsessed... Papa Johns' new range of extra-cheesy pizzas
articles.author: Senior Reporter
articles.summary: Papa John's has unveiled a new range of 'cheesy, gooey pizzas' made with premium British red cheddar cheese. The new range was announced earlier this week and features the Grilled Cheese Pizza, Cheeseburger Pizza and Grilled Ham & Cheese Pizza.

articles.title: Diamond Platnumz expands Business Empire with Wasafi Soap
articles.summary: Diamond Platnumz launched Wasafi Soap on Thursday, 20 March 2025. The soap is set to hit retail shelves across Tanzania and beyond. Industry experts see this move as a significant step in the artiste's journey toward building a multifaceted business empire.

articles.title: These are the Best Cloud Gaming Services in 2025
articles.author: Bryn Gelbart
articles.summary: Cloud gaming is the future of video games. There are four cloud gaming services you can pay for: Xbox Game Pass Ultimate, PlayStation Plus Premium, NVIDIA GeForce Now, and Amazon Luna. NVIDIA and Amazon are leading the charge on PC cloud gaming, while Microsoft and Sony have their own equivalent for consoles.

articles.title: Poco 2025 Smartphone
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Poco announced the global launch of its F7 series, including the much-anticipated Poco F7, on March 21st in Singapore. Poco's F7 is a new version of its popular F7 mobile phone.    Read more here.

articles.title: Panda Express opened in Foggy Bottom
articles.author: --Ppa-Color-Scheme
articles.summary: The Panda Express in Foggy Bottom opened. It's at 22nd and I, where Beefsteak used to be. You can see their menus here. 800 22nd Street, NW, New York, NY, 10007. Bob sent a photo of the place.

articles.title: Grand reception as NSW Colour TV tunes in to celebrate golden anniversary
articles.summary: NSW Colour TV Co has served Newcastle and the Hunter Region for 50 years. The company has a reputation for reliability and expertise in residential and commercial TV solutions. It's one of the oldest companies specialising in TV in Australia. It started in 1974 in Hamilton and moved to Dennison Street for 27 years, then Turton Road for 20 years, and now it's at Mayfield for the last 3 years.

articles.title: NSE launches dedicated website for municipal bonds
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: The National Stock Exchange (NSE) on Friday announced the launch of a new stock exchange. NSE will be called the NSE NSE Securities Ltd. on Friday. It will be based on NSE's NSE-NSE Securities Limited stock exchange platform.

articles.title: I went to the newest shop on Edinburgh's Princes Street and this is what I bought
articles.author: Lifestyle Editor
articles.summary: Gaby Soutar went to the opening of Miniso's first Scottish store in Edinburgh's 88 Princes Street. She was given a £50 voucher to spend. She bought a lot of stuff for her nephews and nieces, but she only spent £10 more than the voucher.

articles.title: Latest Call of Duty collaboration finally lets you rub your body with Soap - and ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: The new Call of Duty x Dr. Squatch collaboration might make gamers take a shower. It's called "Call of Duty: Black Ops 3" and it's a collaboration between Activision and Dr.Squatch. It will be released on November 25th.

articles.title: Motorola Nordic Wood Edition
articles.author: Bhupendra Singh Chundawat
articles.summary: Motorola's next-gen foldable smartphone Razr 60 Ultra is already creating a buzz ahead of its official unveiling. Following the announcement, following the launch of Razr's foldable phone, Motorola is expected to launch a foldable handset Razr 65 Ultra.

articles.title: 7 little-known uses for the silica gel packets that come with shoes & bags & why you shouldn't ever throw them away
articles.author: Becky Pemberton
articles.summary: The silica gel packets that come inside handbags and shoes can be useful around your home. Silica gel absorbs moisture from the air, making it harder for mould and bacteria to grow and preventing rust stains on razors and nail clippers. They can also prevent make-up from hardening and prevent powders from becoming difficult to use. They're great for preserving important documents.

articles.title: State Of GenAI – Only 1%  – ShopTalk 2025 In Numbers
articles.author: Lutz Finger
articles.summary: Surprise: the generative AI future has not yet arrived in business. We analyzed 700 vendors at ShopTalk - the biggest e-commerce conference of the year - in regards to Generative AI (GenAI). The results are surprising. About 70% of the companies focused on data and AI were startups.
